original_title: VeggieTales: The End of Silliness? More Really Silly Songs!
overview: Archibald Asparagus has cancelled 'Silly Songs with Larry'! A despondent Larry the Cucumber drowns his sorrows at Jimmy Gourd's ice cream parlor. Will Archibald give Larry his job back? How much ice cream can Larry eat before getting a headache? Is this the end of...Silly Songs with Larry?
title: VeggieTales: The End of Silliness? More Really Silly Songs!
